name: Blaznana Monkey Trick
description: Sweet Dreams Troupe with their reason clouded by the shade of the AtaviSearch Forest. They carry with them the memetic virus borne into fruit in the Wonder Forest, banaoldly promoting the banacreed of the Slumbernana Monkey and Dr. Primitive's banadvice.

skills.name: Pride of the Monkey Pack
skills.description: In this battle, Blaznana Monkey Trick shares HP with all Banacademic Office members.

skills.name: Banacademic Curriculum
skills.description: Adds "End-of-Semester Dinner" in the Action Order. Every time "End-of-Semester Dinner" takes action, dispels all Crowd Control debuffs and Weakness Broken states on all "Banacademic Office" members on the field, switches the "Off-Class Channel" state on all "Banacademic Office" members to "Classroom Channel" states, and uses "To the Doctor: Banacademic Report."

skills.name: To the Doctor: Banacademic Report
skills.description: Increases all friendly units' ATK. Reduces all target units' Energy and Skill Points and deals Quantum and Fire DMG to all target units, with a chance to apply Slow and a high chance to inflict "Burn."

skills.name: Regular Examination
skills.description: When enemy units in the "Classroom Channel" state are switched to "Off-Class Channel" via either Breaking their Weaknesses or accumulating the tally, reduces the Toughness of "Blaznana Monkey Trick". When all enemy units are Weakness Broken, attacking any enemy units can reduce the Toughness of "Blaznana Monkey Trick" by a minor amount. When "Blaznana Monkey Trick" is Weakness Broken, all enemy targets will be Broken, and the "Blaznana Monkey Trick" will enter the "Safeguard Breach" state.
